casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Bryan Anthony GILLIS, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157343
COA: 341360 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 27, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the January 17, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered and, pursuant to MCR 7.305(H)(1), in lieu of granting leave to appeal, we REMAND this case to the Court of Appeals for consideration, as on leave granted, of whether the trial court was authorized to order the defendant to pay a fine. In all other respects, leave to appeal is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the remaining question presented should be reviewed by this Court.
